title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Advanced Clarification Skills Development Program for Physics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental physics theory and basic pedagogical understanding
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can make evidence-based decisions in physics problem situations with over 80% accuracy
Learners achieve systematic argumentation skills for complex physical phenomena rated at 4.0 or higher (on a 5.0 scale)
Learners can provide three or more constructive feedbacks on peer teachers' lesson designs using the CLM model
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
